languages.text: {n}Махарий тискает рукоять парадного клинка, будто пытается его задушить, и яростно хрипит:{/n} "Высокая честь для дома Зауэрбэк".
{n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий тискает рукоять парадного клинка, будто пытается его задушить, и яростно хрипит:{/n} "Высокая честь для дома Зауэрбэк".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "High honour for House Sauerback."

{n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."
{n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

languages.text: {n}Macharius se met à serrer la poignée de son épée comme s'il essayait de l'étrangler et siffle d'un ton furieux :{/n} « C'est un grand honneur pour la maison Sauerback. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius se met à serrer la poignée de son épée comme s'il essayait de l'étrangler et siffle d'un ton furieux :{/n} « C'est un grand honneur pour la maison Sauerback. »

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯紧握着仪式剑的剑柄，仿佛要扼死它一样。他愤怒地喘息道。{/n}“对苏尔贝克家族来说，这真是崇高的荣誉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯紧握着仪式剑的剑柄，仿佛要扼死它一样。他愤怒地喘息道。{/n}“对苏尔贝克家族来说，这真是崇高的荣誉。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius umklammert den Griff seiner Paradeklinge, als würde er sie erdrosseln wollen, und keucht zornig:{/n} "Eine hohe Ehre für Haus Sauerback."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius umklammert den Griff seiner Paradeklinge, als würde er sie erdrosseln wollen, und keucht zornig:{/n} "Eine hohe Ehre für Haus Sauerback."

languages.text: {n}Macharius aprieta la empuñadura de su espada de desfile como si intentara estrangularla y jadea furiosamente:{/n} «Un gran honor para la casa Sauerback».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius aprieta la empuñadura de su espada de desfile como si intentara estrangularla y jadea furiosamente:{/n} «Un gran honor para la casa Sauerback».

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは、まるで首を絞めるかのように儀礼用の剣の柄を握り締め、荒くハァハァと息をして言葉を絞り出す。{/n}「ザウアーバック家へ大きな名誉を」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは、まるで首を絞めるかのように儀礼用の剣の柄を握り締め、荒くハァハァと息をして言葉を絞り出す。{/n}「ザウアーバック家へ大きな名誉を」

languages.text: {n}Macharius, tören kılıcının kabzasını boğarmışçasına sıkıp öfkeyle hırıldıyor.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi için çok büyük bir şeref."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius grips the hilt of his parade blade as if trying to strangle it, and wheezes furiously:{/n} "A high honour for House Sauerback."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, tören kılıcının kabzasını boğacakmışçasına sıkıyor ve öfkeyle hırıldıyor.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi için çok büyük bir şeref."
